mapper.select: SELECT s.store_info_code as 'storeInfoCode' ,b2.menu_code as 'menuCode' ,sum(s.sales_count) as 'salesCount' ,b2.cosdetail_unit_total as 'cosdetailUnitTotal' ,(b2.cosdetail_unit_total * sum(s.sales_count)) AS 'cosdetailDailySalesTotal' ,NOW() FROM tb_sales AS s JOIN (SELECT m.store_info_code ,m.menu_code ,m.menu_name ,SUM(c.con_volume * s.stock_min_unit) AS 'cosdetail_unit_total' FROM tb_menu AS m LEFT JOIN tb_consumption AS c ON m.menu_code = c.menu_code LEFT JOIN tb_stock AS s ON c.article_code = s.article_code GROUP BY m.menu_code, m.store_info_code) AS b2 ON s.menu_code = b2.menu_code WHERE s.sales_deadline_tax = 'x' GROUP BY b2.menu_code
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_sales SET sales_count=#{salesCount}, sales_total=#{salesTotal}, sales_supply_value=#{salesTotal}/1.1, sales_tax=sales_total-sales_supply_value, sales_vat_type=#{salesVatType}, sales_pay_type=#{salesPayType}, cust_code=#{custCode}, sales_date=#{salesDate}, sales_reg_date=NOW() WHERE sales_code=#{salesCode};
mapper.select: SELECT s.sales_code , i.store_info_code , i.store_info_name , s.menu_code , s.sales_count , s.sales_total , s.sales_supply_value , s.sales_tax , s.sales_vat_type , s.sales_pay_type , s.cust_code , s.sales_date , s.sales_reg_date , s.sales_deadline_tax , s.sales_deadline_dailyvol , s.sales_system_id , s.sales_system_name FROM tb_sales AS s LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS i ON s.store_info_code = i.store_info_code WHERE s.sales_code = #{salesCode};

SELECT SUM(if(d.deal_cate='매출', d.deal_total, 0)) AS 'totalSales' ,SUM(if(d.deal_cate='매입', d.deal_total, 0)) AS 'totalPurchases' ,SUM(if(d.deal_cate='기타매입', d.deal_total, 0)) AS 'totalOtherPurchases'
FROM tb_dealing AS d WHERE d.deal_date BETWEEN #{searchFirstDate} AND #{searchLastDate} AND d.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sales (sales_code, store_info_code, menu_code, sales_count, sales_total, sales_supply_value, sales_tax, sales_vat_type, sales_pay_type, cust_code, sales_date, sales_reg_date, sales_deadline_tax, sales_deadline_dailyvol, sales_system_id, sales_system_name) VALUES (sf_new_sales_code(), #{storeInfoCode}, #{menuCode}, #{salesCount}, #{salesTotal}, #{salesTotal}/1.1, sales_total-sales_supply_value, #{salesVatType}, #{salesPayType}, #{custCode}, #{salesDate}, NOW(), 'x', 'x', #{salesSystemId}, #{salesSystemName})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sales_code, s.store_info_code, s.menu_code, m.menu_name, s.sales_count, s.sales_total, s.sales_supply_value, s.sales_tax, s.sales_vat_type, s.sales_pay_type, s.cust_code, c.cust_name, s.sales_date, s.sales_reg_date, s.sales_system_id, s.sales_system_name FROM tb_sales AS s LEFT JOIN tb_menu AS m ON s.menu_code = m.menu_code LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON s.cust_code = c.cust_code WHERE s.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE} AND s.sales_deadline_tax = 'x'

SELECT s.sales_code, s.store_info_code, s.menu_code, m.menu_name, s.sales_count, s.sales_total, s.sales_supply_value, s.sales_tax, s.sales_vat_type, s.sales_pay_type, s.cust_code, c.cust_name, s.sales_date, s.sales_reg_date, s.sales_system_id, s.sales_system_name FROM tb_sales AS s LEFT JOIN tb_menu AS m ON s.menu_code = m.menu_code LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON s.cust_code = c.cust_code WHERE s.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE} AND s.sales_deadline_dailyvol = 'x';

SELECT s.sales_code, s.store_info_code, s.menu_code, m.menu_name, s.sales_count, s.sales_total, s.sales_supply_value, s.sales_tax, s.sales_vat_type, s.sales_pay_type, s.cust_code, c.cust_name, s.sales_date, s.sales_reg_date, s.sales_deadline_dailyvol, s.sales_deadline_tax, s.sales_system_id, s.sales_system_name FROM tb_sales AS s LEFT JOIN tb_menu AS m ON s.menu_code = m.menu_code LEFT JOIN tb_customer AS c ON s.cust_code = c.cust_code WHERE s.store_info_code = #{SSTORECODE};
